name: ragflow_retrieval
description: Search RAGFlow datasets and retrieve relevant documents for a given question. Supports filtering by dataset/document IDs and advanced search parameters.

arguments.name: question
arguments.desc: The question or query to search for in RAGFlow datasets

arguments.name: dataset_ids
arguments.desc: Optional list of dataset IDs to search in. If omitted, searches all available datasets

arguments.name: document_ids
arguments.desc: Optional list of specific document IDs to filter search results

arguments.name: page_size
arguments.desc: Number of results per page (recommended: 5-20 to avoid token limits)

arguments.name: similarity_threshold
arguments.desc: Minimum similarity score threshold for results (0.0-1.0)

arguments.name: vector_similarity_weight
arguments.desc: Weight balance between vector and keyword similarity (0.0=keyword only, 1.0=vector only)

arguments.name: keyword
arguments.desc: Enable keyword-based search in addition to vector search

arguments.name: top_k
arguments.desc: Maximum number of candidates to consider before final ranking

arguments.name: rerank_id
arguments.desc: Optional reranking model identifier for result ordering

arguments.name: force_refresh
arguments.desc: Force refresh cached metadata (use sparingly for performance)
